## Health & Epidemiology

::: {.g-col-12}
[![](files/images/map.jpg)](https://ekubuafor28.shinyapps.io/Spatial/)  
**[Spatiotemporal Patterns of Outbreak-Related Illnesses](https://ekubuafor28.shinyapps.io/Spatial/)**  
Analyzed 50 years of U.S. outbreak data using Shiny dashboards and spatial statistics.
:::

::: {.g-col-12}
